Job Description:
What Does a great Software Development Engineer do at Fiserv?
Fiserv is looking for a talented Software Development Engineer to lead design, development and implementation of one of its flagship products for its clients as part of an agile team. The ideal candidate is able to collaborate on product, design and architectural roadmap execution; provide technical insight and guidance on product roadmap to product owners; establish software design best practices and ensure adherence to them; ensure alignment with technical strategy through reviews with architecture team; eliminate technical impediments; ensure our product technology stack is aligned with technical advancements in industry; design and develop core extensions to the web application framework; is able to share ideas in strong product setting; is able to communicate with other team members; is able to partner with multiple engineering teams, and multi-functional stakeholders and; adhere to Agile Sprints, Delivery Framework, and SDLC best practices.
What you will do:
Collaborate on the execution of the product, design and architectural roadmaps.
Work with the product owner to provide technical insight and guidance into the product roadmap.
Assist in establishing coding, software design approaches and standards and ensure the product teams are adhering to standard methodologies.
Review process, components and dependencies with the architecture team to ensure alignment with technical strategy.
Focus on eliminating any pressing technical impediments to the teams.
Stay up to date with technology advancement and ensure our product technology stack is optimized for strategic growth.
Provide inspiration and guidance to the growing team; champion a culture of openness, collaboration and innovation.
Design and develop core extensions to an innovative web application framework.
Passionate about development and is anxious to learn from other high-level developers.
Team player with ability to collaborate idea sharing in strong product setting.
Able to communicate, encourage and empower all levels of staff.
Partner with multiple engineering teams, and multi-functional stakeholders.
Adhere to Agile Sprints, Delivery Framework, and SDLC best practices.
What you will need to have:
Bachelor's degree required.
8+ years of hands-on experience in developing web applications using Java and React JS
2+ years of applying Spring components: Core, Boot, Data, MVC, Cloud.
4+ years of relational database design & modeling.
1+ year or exposure to administering & consuming Azure/AWS services.
Knowledge of Visualization tool like Tableau would be added advantage.
Experience designing and maintaining large-scale web applications.
Experience on Integration of web application with Tableau and handling user security.
Strong verbal and written communication; ability to interact at all levels of an organization
What would be nice to have:
Advanced Degree and/or Industry Certifications.
Advanced understanding of the Java programming language and common APIs.
Knowledge of the entire Spring platform including Boot and Cloud.
Experience building distributed, service oriented, microservices-style and cloud-based application architectures.
Containerization experience with applications deployed on Docker or Kubernetes.
Advanced knowledge of the AWS platform.
Experience in an SAFe Agile environment.
Experience with cloud infrastructure support in mixed Linux and Windows environments.
Related banking industry experience in platforms, banking applications, or online financial solutions.
Keywords: Java, Java8, React.Js, Java 8, Reacts Js

The Solution Architect is responsible for actively engaging in and leading the architecture in their assigned domain(s) by collaborating with client, technical manager, application, and data engineer. This position will be actively involved with implementing cloud solutions that meet project needs.
Co-ordinate with Business owner to understand business requirements and break-down into user stories.
Understand the system dependencies involved. Provide relevant inputs to the business to determine the Feature priorities.
Architecting solutions and prepare designs in an incremental fashion.
Create System Integration and System Architecture Design Document
Participate in Architectural discussions at program level and ensure the implementation at Scrum team level.
Assist the Architect group during creation of Architectural Roadmap.
Guide the project team to estimate accurately and decide the PI Objectives during Planning meeting.
Provide technical architectural leadership to the team on day-to-day basis throughout the project lifecycle and resolve technical challenges.
Research new technologies/frameworks and lead POCs. Recommend skill enhancements / trainings for the project team.
Ensure adherence to development best practices, policies and procedures.
Remain in-sync with enterprise standards and initiatives.
Must Have:
Overall 10+ years of experience in software development.
At least 3+ years of experience as a solution architect in Java, Spring Boot with Azure environment
Strong Designing/Architectural and consultative skills.
Ability to design, write, debug deploy J2EE applications in Azure environment.
Hands-on (Back-End): Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, OAuth 2.0 and Spring JPA. SOA/MicroServices, Azure functions, web jobs, COSMOS DB, UML, JUnit/TestNG, Mocking frameworks, Messaging Queue, Git, DevOps.
Working knowledge of (Front-End): Web 2.0 technologies, NodeJS, Typescript, UI Frameworks like Angular8/React, NGRX etc.
Good to have:
Excellent written verbal communication, documentation skills to create technical documentation.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Have hands on experience in Agile preferably SAFE environment.
Keywords: Java, Hibernate, Software Development, Git, Big Data, J2Ee, Spring Boot, Microservices, Solution Architect, Spring Security

Job description

As an developer you have a huge impact on how we design, build and deliver our product/service to our users
You are responsible for writing efficient and maintainable code. Our current technologies are JAVA /J2EE / Hibernate / Spring / JSP / Servlets / Struts.
You are a generalist and able to work across the software stack
You will have to find efficient and thoughtful solutions to a variety of technical and product challenge.
You are responsible for the back end server side coding but if required can work on front end too.

BE/MCA in Computer Science or related technical field (MS is a plus)
2+ years as an coder / developer in Java and J2EE
Strong understanding of OOPs and developing
You are a web developer with mad coding skills, who can build innovative applications fast and with high quality
You have working knowledge of Hibernate / Springs / JSP / Struts / JSON / JBoss
Your understand Web Service Technology ( JAX-RS, JAX-WS, WSDL/SOAP/UDDI)

You can take ownership of a feature from idea to production, with minimal guidance and supervision.

Job Description:
Role & responsibilities

The Java Senior Software Engineer in Adeptia Product team & will be responsible for requirement analysis, design, development/coding and unit testing of new features and fixing bugs. He/ She will Guide & mentor the team. He/she must be hands-on with coding & design.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES:
Understand customer requirement & create functional specification/use cases along with nonfunctional requirements.
Develops high and low level application design artifacts including process flows, data model and interfaces based on maintenance, operations and performance standards. Ensure all technical deliverables are consistent with architectural standards guidelines.
Develops software application, Unit test & integration testing.
 Coordinate the design activities with the development team, including the creation of class models, sequence diagrams, component models, etc., and detailed design specifications to ensure that requirement are met and technology standards are followed.
Provide support/guidelines to the development team during the analysis, Design, development, testing and implementation and post production support phases.
Develop and evaluate prototypes and proof of concepts.
 Develop unit and integration testing approach, documents test scripts & conduct unit and integration testing.
 Conduct code review & ensure overall code quality.
 Provide assistance to tester and support personnel as needed to determine system problems.  Review, to the extent possible, changes in code and the environment that will affects system performance.
 Utilize software engineering tools such as configuration management system (CVS), build processes, and debuggers in the software development process

Preferred candidate profile

Core and Advanced Java
XML and XSDs  Webservices (REST and SOAP)
 Experience in the Spring Framework
Object Oriented analysis and design using common design pattern
 Experience with Java Script framework (EXTJS/Angular JS etc.)
 Knowledge of Relational Databases, SQL and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate)
Profound insight of Java and JEE internals (Class loading, Garbage Collection, Memory Management, Transaction Management etc.)
Experience of working with CI/CD tools like Jenkins


About Adeptia Adeptia believes business users should be able to access information anywhere, anytime by creating data connections themselves, and its mission is to enable that self-service capability. Adeptia is a unique social network for digital business connectivity for citizen integrators to respond quickly to business opportunities and get to revenue faster. Adeptia helps Information Technology (IT) staff to manage this capability while retaining control and security. Adeptia s unified hybrid offering  with simple data connectivity in the cloud, and optional on-premises enterprise process-based integration  provides a competitive advantage to 450+ customers, ranging from Fortune 500 companies to small businesses. Headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA and with an office in Noida, India, Adeptia provides world-class support to its customers around-the-clock. For more, visit www.adeptia.com Our Locations:  India R&D Centre: D-74, Sector 63, NOIDA 201301, INDIA  US Headquarters: 343 West Erie, Suite 430, Chicago, IL 60654, USA

Job Description:
The Quality Assurance Analyst s role is to develop and establish quality assurance standards and measures for specific teams within the organization
This individual will also gather and analyze data in support of business cases, proposed projects, and systems requirements
This will include writing and executing test plans and tracking defects as they arise
The QA Analyst will apply proven analytical and problem- solving skills to help validate processes through careful testing to maximize the benefit of business investments
PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:
The Integration Services QA engineer is responsible for ensuring the quality of Integration solutions on our shared Integration platform, establishing an automation platform, define reusable testing artifacts to support integration patterns
QA engineer is expected to possess strong technical expertise as well as strong leadership and mentoring skills
Responsible for developing Test strategy for Integration Solutions
Responsible for building Automated testing platform for the integration solutions
Develop re-usable testing patterns based on Integration patterns
Work collaboratively with Development team, Business teams and other team members to improve testing efficiencies.
Contribute to Integration Development best practices and standards.
Support TIBCO application deployments and change management team in performing deployments.
Exercise judgment in prioritizing and delegating work coming in from multiple stakeholders and offer recommendations.
Create and update high-quality documentation for maintaining the life cycle of integration solutions.
Provide technical guidance and subject matter expertise to Enterprise Services Team members, both onshore and offshore.
key contact for Project Managers, advising on project sizing and estimation
Trouble shoot and Support Interface failures in Production and build After Action Reviews for major issues.
Manage defects during development and testing cycles and triage the defects.
Be a core team member for establishing and governing SDLC Process for Integration solutions
Responsible for establishing Testing related Documentation templates included in SDLC of Integration links
REQUIRED SKILLS/KNOWLEDGE/ABILITIES
Bachelors degree in computer science or related field. Equivalent technical experience may be substituted for this educational requirement.
5+ years of experience in testing applications involving SOAP and REST based Web Services/APIs with XML, JSON based message formats, Integration technologies like Tibco EMS or JMS, Kafka
5+ years experience in API testing with Postman, SOAP UI etc
5+ years experience building and executing Performance Tests,
3+ years experience building and working on any BDD Driven and IntegrationTest automation Frameworks
Working knowledge of Jenkins/Azure DevOps or similar CI/CD build orchestration tools
1+ years of experience testing solutions on with Tibco BW/EMS or like middleware platform solutions
1+ years of working experience on Web Services Gateway / API Gateway platforms
3+ years experience working on .NET Core / .NET Framework and C# is a plus
Good knowledge on core Java, JDBC and J2EE technologies is a plus.
Knowledge of Unix Shell scripting, and experience in using Putty, WinSCP/FileZilla tools
Experience with bug tracking systems, like Quality Center and JIRA
Familiarity with distributed/version control systems like SVN, GitBucket, Azure DevOps etc..
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with stakeholders, at various organizational levels.
Demonstrated interest in learning new technologies and applications.
Ability to build strong relationships with geographically dispersed teams and vendors.
Prior experience in Shared Services (Preferred)
Keywords: JMS, Core Java, Automation, XML, JDBC, J2Ee, JSON, Middleware, SDLC, Unix shell scripting

Job Description:
Build and extend backend applications in AWS environment.
Ensure that customer-facing applications are designed to be highly available, observable, and durable via software engineering best practices.
Work with Product and Project Owners to understand end-user requirements, formulate user stories, and translate those into pragmatic and effective technical solutions.
Work closely with onsite and remote frontend, backend, and operations engineers to ensure deliverables are well-documented, secure, and resilient.
Help engineering management prioritize technical roadmap and identify gaps in process and planning.
Establish and document development best practices and ensure that the team adheres to these practices.
Build and maintain AWS-based integration using ECS, S3, and DynamoDB.
Skills and Experience
Minimum 4 years of experience in developing, deploying, scaling, and maintaining AWS-cloud based Microservices and APIs.
Mandatory development experience in Java/j2ee, Spring Boot, and Kafka or JMS concepts.
Any experience in the supply chain industry, especially active warehouse management, would be a huge plus.
Experience in DevOps in AWS (like CloudFormation, Jenkins) is desirable.
Should be productive in Java/J2EE development environments.
Prior experience in monitoring tools like Splunk or SignalFX, and unit testing frameworks is a plus.
Must have strong software development fundamentals, including automated testing, source control (GitLab), CICD and/or deployment.
Hands-on with integrating web frontends with complex multi-tier applications.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills and a strong willingness to learn and teach.
A passion for solving problems and a desire to understand how things work.
Ability to troubleshoot and resolve production system issues efficiently.
Comfortable authoring well-designed, testable, efficient code.

Job Description:
Financial Model Java Engineer | Trefis Financial Model Java Engineer Trefis provides a new breed of fundamental analysis and visualization tools to retail and institutional investors.
We started a few years ago with a team of three, but have grown rapidly and now count consulting firms, top 5 banks, and Fortune 500 companies as our customers. Yet we are only getting started towards our goal of monetizing a $30B+ market. Executed properly, our product will be hugely disruptive to the investment banking industry.
This is an exciting time for our business, so if youre looking to make a ton of impact working with a small team, we want to hear from you.
Trefis has developed unique technology to convert Excel- based financial models into interactive online analyses (visualizations) as demonstrated on the Trefis.com website (search for AAPL on the website). We have partnered with some of the worlds most significant and prestigious financial research providers to provide interactive versions of their financial research online.
ABOUT THE ROLE
We are looking for someone to play a key role in providing technical know- how and engineering support as part of a team effort to review financial models of Trefis partners. Tasks will include troubleshooting, optimizing efficiency, and planning and developing new features for Trefis visualization technology. The role will involve working closely with a team of analysts and engineers based in Delhi and Boston. High performing individuals will have the opportunity to take on greater responsibility defining the Trefis product and designing and implementing solutions.
REQUIRED SKILLS

has experience in both Java and JavaScript
has excellent analytical reasoning and debugging skills (e.g.

Job Description:
Job Overview
FranConnect is looking for an experienced Software Application Architect to make intuitive and impactful decisions for software development. You will see the big picture and create and review architectural artifacts and decisions for software design; lead the architecting process, and guide the development teams through implementation.

Responsibilities
Work closely with CTO and other Engineering leaders to develop design guidelines and architecture roadmaps.
Collaborate with teams to determine functional and non-functional requirements for systems applications, develop and document high-level product specifications with design decisions, address various stakeholders' concerns in the design and successfully communicate all concepts and guidelines to the development team.
Oversee progress of development team to ensure consistency of implementation with design. Provide technical guidance and coaching to developers and guide the software development process through high-level decision-making.
Research and propose emerging technology solutions, frameworks, and tools for application modernization and technology transformation.
Create and maintain design and code standards.
Serve as a technical liaison among engineering managers, developers, product managers, and other stakeholders.
Analyze and troubleshoot complex production issues with teams.

Job Qualifications and Skill Sets:
Bachelor's or Masters degree in engineering from a well-reputed institute. Over 10 years of proven, hands-on, work experience as a software engineer, technology leader, and application designer.
Proficiency in Java, JEE, Spring, Spring boot, and Relational databases. Solid experience in designing REST APIs. Knowledge of a few NoSQL databases.
Good knowledge of software architecture concepts, OOP, various software design patterns, domain-driven design, and code quality.
Experience designing and implementing high-scalability, high-performance cloud-native web applications on at least one cloud service (AWS, Azure, GCP).
Good hands-on working experience in analyzing and documenting software architecture artifacts.
Experience in working in an agile environment. Good knowledge of Scrum and DevOps practices.
Strong communication and presentation skills. Should be able to communicate frequently, candidly, and clearly on complex technical issues.
Demonstrated ability to go the extra mile, Self-starter, and self-motivated with a can-do attitude. Comfortable working in a fast-paced dynamic environment
Keywords: Enterprise Architecture, Java, Architectural Design, Technical Architecture, Software Design, Scalability, OOAD, Strategic Technology Planning, Technical Leadership, Design Decision, Spring Boot, Microservices, Solid Principles, Architecting, AWS, J2Ee Architecture

Job Description:
The monitoring screening tribe is responsible for the detection and prevention of financial crime: Fraud, Money Laundering, and Sanctions breaches. We do that by applying models to all transactions passing through the bank and detecting outliers that warrant further investigation, supporting the investigation with data from internal and external sources to support fast and accurate decision-making and following through until the case is closed.
We are hiring Data Platform Engineers responsible for deploying and maintaining the Platform for data models while pushing the boundaries of the newest available technologies. We strive for building robust, scalable, and easily maintainable solutions, the bank is now starting the journey to move to the Public Cloud.
Job description
We are looking for a Data Platform with solid experience - preferably from a senior position in a similar role. We are a new department and we are still building processes and maturing the tech stack. Therefore, we are looking for an engaged, self-driven person that can take on responsibility from the first day. Furthermore, we are looking for experience and a personality that will question and challenge the existing to help us drive the data agenda within Data Science forward. Finally, we are seeking people that are hands-on and are able to take tasks and projects to the finishing line.
Maintain and Develop Fraud screening applications using existing machine learning model infrastructure known as Advanced Analytics Platform for Fraud (AAPF)
You will be part of the team managing and stabilizing one of the key model execution platforms
Experienced in distributed technologies Design, Development, Implementation, Integration Debugging, and Monitoring.
In depth experience in Java, J2EE OOPs concepts, analysis design, design pattern etc..
Must to have
Expertise in Java Development
Cloud development
Docker and Kubernetes
DevOps experience
Messaging systems (e.g. RabbitMQ or Kafka)
Good to have
Mavens
Network architecture
Jenkins
Data backend (e.g. Cassandra)
Nice to have
Pubsub with IBM MQ
Chef
Knowledge of e.g. Jira and Confluence
SOAP API
Some Hadoop knowledge
AppDynamics monitoring
Keywords: Backend, cassandra, Debugging, Machine learning, Cloud, Design development, J2Ee, JIRA, network architecture, Monitoring

Job Description:
Senior Java Developer, CARS24 Location, Gurugram/ Bangalore
At CARS24, technology isn't just embraced it's the driving force behind transforming the
global used car industry. Our goal isn't mere size; it's achieving excellence. As India's premier
auto-tech pioneer, we're more than an organisation; we're architects of experiences,
champions of innovation, and creators of a groundbreaking tech-driven future.
For those who live and breathe innovation, CARS24 is your ultimate career destination. As a
Backend Developer, you won't just navigate you'll be the engine powering our solid
engineering foundation. Our focus goes beyond products; we're nurturing a "Product
Engineering" mindset in our DNA. Your role symbolises engineering excellence  identifying
seamless services, rapid patterns, and adaptable congurations for new needs. This isn't just
a role; it's a transformation. Merge strategic vision with hands-on leadership, propelling teams
to engineer with purpose and passion. It's more than management; it's the fuel propelling us
beyond boundaries.
Are you ready to accelerate your career, make an imprint of innovation, and steer the future of
AutoTech? Seize the wheel on this exciting journey with us.
ROLES & RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Product Engineering Mindset: Integrate "Product Engineering" thinking into the
development lifecycle, fostering adaptable systems and congurations for seamless
accommodation of new requirements.
2. Code Quality: Write high-quality code aligned with business objectives, contributing to
the achievement of organisational goals.
3. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with various teams, understanding their
needs, providing solutions, and eectively managing expectations.
4. Continuous Learning: Keep abreast of industry trends by reading tech blogs, books,
and staying updated on global product designs and innovative solutions.




5. Tech Stack Expertise: Possess a comprehensive understanding of tech stacks, making
informed decisions supported by engineering principles and data.
6. Technical Prociency: Understand the functioning of the web, troubleshoot
production failures, and provide quick xes and lasting solutions.
7. Framework and Platform Knowledge: Grasp the design of frameworks and
development of platforms, including security considerations, containerization, and
production monitoring.
8. Language Prociency: Display expertise in Java and its ecosystem, with a willingness
to explore and write code in new languages when advantageous.
9. Hands-On Leadership: Lead by example with hands-on coding and solution design,
articulating your decisions through practical implementation.
10. Open-Source Integration: Identify and incorporate solutions from open-source
codebases into CARS24's products.
11. Cost-Eective Solutions: Understand the cost implications of engineering decisions
and apply sound reasoning to deploy optimal solutions.
12. Innovation Implementation: Architect A/B frameworks, high-performance web
applications, secure systems, congurable workows, and cutting-edge recommender
systems.
13. Industry Exposure: Contribute to exposing internal products to the wider industry,
leveraging this strategic advantage.
14. Building Resilient Systems: Construct enduring systems with a long-term perspective,
embracing calculated risks and engineering pride.
15. Eciency Advocacy: Drive automation, follow Test-Driven Development (TDD), and
champion ecient problem-solving methodologies.
TECH AT OUR CORE
At CARS24, we harness a versatile array of technologies that elevate our operations to new
heights. This dynamic tech ecosystem sets the stage for your role as a Senior Java Developer
at CARS24. Here's a glimpse into the tech landscape that propels our success:
Diverse Database Expertise: Our tech toolkit includes Aurora, RDS, Elastic Search,
Redis, Arango DB, MongoDB, MySQL, and Snowake. We master the art of data
management for seamless performance.
Next-Level App Development: Our iOS and Android apps boast highly optimised
React Native code, ensuring smooth and ecient user experiences.




Cloud Powerhouse: We're deployed across AWS and GCP, leveraging a multitude of
services from both cloud giants to fuel our operations.
Microservices Brilliance: Following a microservices architecture, we dissect complex
tasks into ecient components, enabling us to build top-quality products.
Agile Excellence: We swear by agile methodologies, ensuring nimble development
cycles and delivering products that meet the highest standards.
Cutting-Edge Pursuits: We're always on the lookout for groundbreaking tools that
give us an edge in a competitive landscape.
Exploring New Frontiers: Our unique domain challenges inspire us to delve into
uncharted tech territories, driving innovation.
Strategic Balance: With a keen eye, we strike a balance between feature-rich
environments, well-dened sets, and core R&D arenas.
QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE
Building scalable, highly available, resilient, extendable, secured architecture to
provide a signicant boost to the business.
5+ years of experience in Java,Spring, Design patterns & Data Structures.
You are a hands-on leader who talks through his code and solution design.
Writing high quality code to achieve business goals.
Working with various cross-functional teams to understand their needs, oering them
solutions and setting and managing their expectations.
Ensuring timely & high quality delivery. Following best practices for development and
championing their adoption as per company dened standards.
Developing with scale and speed amidst ux, there is just a LOT happening.
Up-to-date with emerging technology trends and ability to choose the best
You will regularly read tech blogs, books, and enhance your knowledge. You are
someone who keeps an eye on the best of the product designs across the world and
how best tech companies solve problems at scale.
You understand what, how and why of tech stacks and can defend your decisions with
sound engineering fundamentals and data.
You understand how the web works. Why things fail in production and when they fail
how to provide a quick x and long term solution.
You understand how frameworks are designed and how platforms are developed.
You understand security aspects, Containers, Production monitoring,
You have in-depth knowledge of Java and its ecosystem. You do not mind learning
new languages and writing
code if thats what brings the best of solutions.
You can go into open source code and identify how those solutions can be included
in Cars24 products.




WHY SHOULD YOU APPLY?
At CARS24, our team members are the heartbeat of our success. Joining us means becoming
an integral part of our dynamic and innovative work environment that celebrates individuality,
fuels creativity, and empowers proactive initiative. Your skills will not only be recognized but
also nurtured through new opportunities. Embark on the journey of dening the future of
AutoTech engineering with us.
Our Technology Expert
In your role as a Senior Java Developer role you will have an opportunity to closely
collaborate with Marut Singh, an exceptionally accomplished technology leader with a
remarkable career spanning over two decades. Marut is our Chief Technology Ocer (CTO)
and has been playing a pivotal role in propelling the company's growth and success to new
heights.
Marut Singh stands as a trailblazing gure in the industry. His expertise spans an array of
domains, including Automobile, E-commerce, Logistics, Fintech, Algorithmic Trading, and
EdTech.
Maruts visionary leadership remains rmly focused on the ultimate goal: to lead CARS24 to a
global frontier. As our technology leader, you'll have the invaluable opportunity to work
closely with Marut, leveraging his extensive expertise to drive innovation, reshape industry
norms, and contribute to our collective mission of revolutionising the automotive sector.
WHO ARE WE?
Founded in 2015, CARS24 is India-born, global AutoTech company for pre-owned vehicles
with a robust presence in India, Australia, UAE and Thailand. With a consumer-rst approach,
CARS24s mission is to transform the used car industry by digitising the entire journey of
searching, buying, selling, and nancing.
Our commitment to innovation is the driving force behind our success and our tech-rst
mindset is ingrained in our DNA. Whether its evaluation, customer protection policies,
warranties, or just customer support, every bit of the buying and selling journey is seamlessly
managed by the cutting-edge technology that we use.

Job Description:
The Candidate
The Senior Software Developer will take ownership of the design and development of software applications. An ideal team member will be the one who is motivated and driven towards his/her work and is passionate about learning.

Job Description

Design and implement highly scalabale applications on modern technologies and platform.
Write code and unit tests of highest quality, work on API specs, test automation, and conduct code reviews.
Identify exciting opportunities for adopting new technologies to solve existing technical needs and predicting future challenges. Leverage knowledge of internal and industry in design decisions.
Perform ongoing refactoring of design and code to continuously evolve the product.
Ensure continuous process and technology improvement. Lead with an external perspective, challenge status quo and bring continuous innovation to our existing technologies, design and code.
Work alongside with product managers and scrum masters to understand, and explore features for ongoing sprints and translate them into development work for the iteration.
Work with architects to ensure the creating architecture and design and then ensuring that the design is is validated and implemented in code.
Design and develop proof of concept prototypes for advanced features and designs
Collaborate with development teams on work definition, estimation, and prioritization.

The ideal candidate should also possess the following skills:
Strong analytical & strategic thinking skills. Excellent problem solving skills.
Strong Ability to interpret technical /business objective and challenges.
Experience in working with Agile Methodologies. - Scrum, XP, SAFE in distributed scrum teams.
Demonstrate learning ability, make decisions quickly and with the highest level of integrity.
Demonstrated ability to go the extra mile, Self-starter and self-motivated with a can do attitude. Comfortable working in fast paced dynamic environment
Good team member - Ability to work collaboratively in building a good team, seek and provide mentor-ship and coaching, bring knowledge and learning to the team.

Required Technical Skills and Capabilities
Proficient programming knowledge in Java and Advance JAVA (J2EE).
Strong working experience in JSP, Servlets and MVC/Spring/Struts framework.
Knowledge of REST principles and Cloud.
Strong knowledge of data structures and algorithms and java collection packages.
Experience in designing and implementing java multi-threading applications on Java 8.
Experience in working on PL/SQL languages and optimizing and tuning queries for best performance.
Experience using DB abstraction layers like Hibernate and messaging services (Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ, JMS etc)
Working experience in MySQL database.
Good knowledge of application performance engineering in Java - Concurrency and parallelization of code, JVM tuning, Web performance, DB tuning, choice of data structures etc.
Strong knowledge of developer testing. Experience in developing unit tests(JUNIT, mocks, selenium, TEST-NG), CI/CD tool chain automation - Jenkins Pipeline; build tools like Maven,Gradle and infrastructure tooling like Docker, Vagrant, Ansible, Kubernetes, MESOS etc.
Keywords: Java, JSP, Spring, J2EE, JEE, SOAP, JUnit, MySQL, Struts, JDBC, MVC, AWS, Servlets

The ideal candidate should have strong programming skills in Java and experience with front-end web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
The candidate should also have experience working in an Agile environment and be able to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams

Develop and maintain web applications using Java and related frameworks (such as Spring and Hibernate)
Design and implement user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

Experience in software development using Java and related technologies
Experience with front-end web development technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Knowledge of web application architecture and design patterns
Experience with Agile development methodologies (Scrum, Kanban)
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Experience with source code management tools such as Git or SVN is a plus

Job Description:
The position is for Platform Engineer in Cloud Development Journey in IT Strategy, Architecture and Tools department
As a Platform Engineer in Cloud Development Journey, you will have an opportunity to implement and maintain smooth operation as well as physical design of a distributed AppDynamics fault, performance and trend analytics system. An opportunity to work independently with users to collect requirements and engineering monitoring solutions through customer acceptance. You should have an agile mindset, creative problem-solving skills and your ability to self-organize, take initiative and owning responsibility. Moreover, work autonomously with the mandate to move fast and do things differently.
You will be responsible for working with development teams to establish best practices around release processes and building those into release pipelines from laptop to production.
The position requires good communication skills.

Detailed Responsibility & Skills:-
? Install, Configuration, and Tuning of the following AppDynamics Servers: Controller, Event Service Cluster, End User Monitoring, ADA, ADRUM
? Reviews system design and works to continuously improve stability and efficiencies
? Provides system backup recovery methodology and makes recommendations regarding enhancements and/or improvements
? Formulates policies, procedures, and standards relating to system management, and monitors system resource utilization
? Responsible for reducing operational downtime for critical, scheduled, and unscheduled maintenance by accelerating deployments of approved changes/fixes/updates
and solutions and automate manual maintenance, deployment, diagnostic health checks, validation, and reporting
? Responsible for creating proactive and reactive monitoring methods, generating customer alerts within the Enterprise Event Management and Monitoring capability
? Skilled at user requirement gathering and can work independently to craft efficient monitoring, alarming solutions, and dashboards
? Understands the Agile process
? Ability to operationally support the underlying database as necessary
? Hands-on Java and/or .Net Development
? IT Operations and Application Support
? Application and systems performance management, measurement and analysis.
? Deployment and configuration of complex enterprise software
? Solid understanding of Operating Systems (Linux/Windows)
? Experience with J2EE/LAMP/Microsoft stack
? Cloud and containerization experience
? Strong understanding of built-in O/S monitoring and performance tools.
? Working with a wide variety of platforms and application stacks. Ability to understand new application frameworks in customer environments quickly
? Works with minimal direction as a seasoned resource
? Support customer initiatives in their transition towards modernization
? Tracks own work and backlog, familiar with Agile methodology
? Prioritize own work in accordance with user priorities and stakeholder expectations
? Communicates efficiently and effectively both written and verbal
? Reviews system design and works to continuously improve stability and efficiencies

Mandatory:
? Knowledge about APM tools (NewRelic / AppDynamics / DataDog / OpenTracing)
? Dotnet/Java
? Linux/Windows
? SQL

? API

Job Description:
We are looking for a pragmatic and highly energetic full stack Java Tech Lead for the core product line of our organization, where we will be working on bleeding edge technologies and leading the charge of innovation in the Test Automation industry. This role drives the engineering delivery and works closely with the product team.

What you ll do:
You will be a part of a team developing our core product. You will be an integral part in advancing our technical strategy and work diligently to deliver on that vision. You will also work directly with stakeholders to explore and prove plausibility of concepts and potential solutions. Along with writing and deploying code, you will be responsible for technical design and feasibility, championing modern patterns and principles, delivering value to the business quickly (without sacrificing quality), and leading a team of developers.. A typical day is a mix of hands-on coding, meetings with product stakeholders, team technical discussion and line management activities..

About you:
You ll have:
10 - 13 years of Full Stack JAVA Development experience on multiple stacks including Spring (MVC/IOC),SQL, Angular/React/Vue/MERN/MEAN and SOAP/REST-based Web Services

Mentoring engineers by means of reviewing their code, design documents, project plans etc. to reduce in-efficiencies, increase throughput and ensure short-term decisions are eliminated to ensure resiliency of the systems.
An excellent communicator, both in writing and conversation from a client facing/C-level interaction perspective
Responsible for line management of 10-12 developers, deeply invested in their professional growth and symbiotic relationship with the organization..

Salesforce Platform Development

Job Description:
As Software Development Engineer your focus will be on applying the principles of engineering to software development. The role focuses on the complex and large software systems that make up the core systems for the organization. You will be responsible for developing, unit testing, and integration tasks working within this highly visible-client focused web services application. Development efforts will also include feature enhancements, client implementations, and bug fixes as well as support of the production environment.
What you will do:
Collaborate within a team environment in the development, testing, and support of software development project lifecycles.
Develop web interfaces and underlying business logic.
Prepare any necessary technical documentation.
Track and report daily and weekly activities.
Participate in code reviews and code remediation.
Perform and develop proper unit tests and automation.
Participate in a 24 hour on-call rotation to support previous releases of the product.
Research problems discovered by QA or product support and develop solutions to the problems.
Perform additional duties as determined by business needs and as directed by management.
What you will need to have:
Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Information Technology, or equivalent experience.
3-5 years of experience in developing scalable and secured J2EE applications.
Excellent knowledge in Java based technologies (Core Java, JSP, AJAX, JSF, EJB, and Spring Framework), Oracle SQL/PLSQL and App servers like WebLogic, JBOSS.
Excellent knowledge in SOAP & REST web service implementations.
Knowledge in UNIX environment is preferred.
Experience in JSF UI components (Oracle ADF & Rich Faces) technology is preferred.
Good analytical, organizational, and problem-solving abilities.
Good at prioritizing the tasks and commitment to complete them.
Strong team player / customer service orientation. Demonstrated ability to work with both end users and technical staff.
Ability to track progress against assigned tasks, report status, and proactively identifies issues.
Demonstrate the ability to present information effectively in communications with peers and project management team.
Highly Organized and Works well in a fast paced, fluid and dynamic environment.
What would be great to have:
Experience working in a Scrum Development Team
Banking and Financial Services experience
Java Certifications.
Keywords: Unix, Core Java, Automation, JBoss, JSP, Project management, Weblogic, J2Ee, EJB, Ajax

Job Description:
We are looking for a pragmatic and highly energetic full stack Java Tech Lead for the core product line of our organization, where we will be working on bleeding edge technologies and leading the charge of innovation in the Test Automation industry. This role drives the engineering delivery and works closely with the product team.

What you ll do:
You will be a part of a team developing our core product. You will be an integral part in advancing our technical strategy and work diligently to deliver on that vision. You will also work directly with stakeholders to explore and prove plausibility of concepts and potential solutions. Along with writing and deploying code, you will be responsible for technical design and feasibility, championing modern patterns and principles, delivering value to the business quickly (without sacrificing quality), and leading a team of developers.. A typical day is a mix of hands-on coding, meetings with product stakeholders, team technical discussion and line management activities..

About you:
You ll have:
10 - 13 years of Full Stack JAVA Development experience on multiple stacks including Spring (MVC/IOC),SQL, Angular/React/Vue/MERN/MEAN and SOAP/REST-based Web Services
Understanding of architectural design patterns and frameworks with strong computer-science fundamentals
Hands on experience of at least 1 year with cloud solutions (AWS or Azure preferred), working with infrastructure as code, CI/CD and related tools.
Ability to lead a team of senior developers.
You ll be:
Innovative and have an open-minded problem-solving approach.
Familiar with twelve-factor app methodology for building software-as-a-service applications
Able to define solution options, provide estimates on effort and risk, and evaluate technical feasibility.
Able to rapidly prototype and build robust, scalable solutions and to discern which approach is appropriate for meeting defined objectives.
Mentoring engineers by means of reviewing their code, design documents, project plans etc. to reduce in-efficiencies, increase throughput and ensure short-term decisions are eliminated to ensure resiliency of the systems.
An excellent communicator, both in writing and conversation from a client facing/C-level interaction perspective
Responsible for line management of 10-12 developers, deeply invested in their professional growth and symbiotic relationship with the organization..

It may be advantageous to also have these skills:
Salesforce Platform Development
Selenium/Cypress/WebdriverIO

What you ll get in return:
You ll benefit from:
A competitive salary
Comprehensive health insurance
A vibrant and fun work culture, with regular social activities
Friendly work colleagues who genuinely care about other
A truly diverse working environment
The chance to work with international work colleagues
The opportunity to grow and develop your career

This company will work in the area of derivatives and OTC products, which are the most complex parts of the financial market. The company is laying the foundations of a great culture and the space to build a great organization. Their current objective is to identify individuals who have high expertise, to join their existing team of experts who are spread across the world.

You will have 7+ experience of Java development in order to meet the needs of our expanding portfolio of Financial Services clients.  This is an excellent opportunity to be part of a team based out of Gurgaon and to work with colleagues across multiple regions globally.

Job Title: Lead Java Developer - Noida ( 4 To 6 years )
Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Principal Engineer/Architect with expertise in Java Spring Framework to join our team. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of Micro Service Architecture, Database Design, and REST API. Additionally, the candidate should be knowledgeable about .Net and have experience managing a Transition from a .Net Monolith project to a Java-based Microservices project.

Responsibilities:
* Transition a .Net Project to Java Baaed Microservices Architecture
* Develop, design, and maintain Java-based Microservices architecture using Spring Framework
* Design and implement REST APIs that are scalable, efficient, and maintainable
* Work closely with stakeholders to understand business requirements and develop solutions that meet those needs
* Collaborate with other engineers and architects to ensure that the architecture is aligned with the company's strategic objectives
* Provide technical leadership to the team and mentor junior developers
* Create and maintain technical documentation for the systems and processes
* Conduct code reviews and ensure that the code adheres to best practices and standards
* Monitor and maintain the performance, availability, and security of the applications and infrastructure
* Manage the Transition from a .Net Monolith project to a Java-based Microservices project

Requirements:
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field
* At least 6-8 years of experience in software development, design, and architecture, with a focus on Java Spring Framework
* Deep understanding of Micro Service Architecture, Database Design, and REST API
* Strong Development Experience in Java and Spring Framework
* Strong understanding of Database Design preferably MySQL
* Knowledge of .Net and experience managing a Transition from a .Net Monolith project to a Java-based Micro-services project is a plus
* AWS/Azure Cloud Native Development Experience
* Exposure to No SQL DataStores, Messaging, Cache, etc will be a plus
* Strong leadership and communication skills
* Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
* Experience with Agile development methodologies
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills

If you meet the requirements and are passionate about developing scalable and high-performance systems using Java Spring Framework, we would love to hear from you. Please apply with your resume and cover letter, and we will be in touch shortly.

Job Title: Senior Software Engineer Backend Java/ GIS - Digital Farming
Job Description:
We offer digital solutions for asustainable agriculture by optimizing crop production and support farmersworldwide through monitoring of soil and crop conditions, assisting withdisease and pest recognition, and recommend tailored treatments based on in-fieldconditions.
As Senior Software Engineer BackendJava/ GIS you will be responsible for the Java-based backend development, GISarchitecture and operations inside the globally operating digital farming unit.
You will ensure efficient andcost-effective handling and processing of large volumes of geospatial datalayers, like machinery data, soil and satellite imagery etc.
In close collaboration with ourremote sensing research team you will support the implementation of satellite /drone imagery processing.
Together with the project team youwill translate Digital Farming business needs into IT requirements and concretetechnical implementations covering the whole software development lifecycle.
At last, you will participate in allphases of the product governance and development life cycle, including writingepics, user stories and support the sprint planning in our agile developmentsetup.

Qualifications
Bachelors degree in computersciences, natural sciences, engineering, mathematics, GIS or related fields.
Solid experience with Java GeoTools,PostGIS, QGIS and GeoServer.
Good understanding of geospatialrelated concepts like raster/ vector data handling, geometry simplification,statistical clustering, filters and geometric operations.
Good understanding of handling farmmachinery data and environmental data layers like soil, topology etc. would bean advantage
Excellent communication in Englishand analytical skills to build as well as maintain good working relationshipsacross the entire organization
